name: Go Nuts Mobile
description: Break free from your boring life and become the superhero of every squirrel’s dreams! In this mobile infinite scrolling runner, control A.J. as he fights rodent crime and saves the squirrels of the world from the evil BIRD MAN and his aerial egg attacks. Run through rural neighborhoods as you avoid traps, obstacles, and BIRD MAN to collect Acorns! Don’t forget to grab acorns to fill your Nut-O-Meter to unleash your inner beast and GO NUTS!
